metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2659 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was found that dropbear before version 2013.59 with GSSAPI leaks whether given username is valid or invalid. When an invalid username is given, the GSSAPI authentication failure was incorrectly counted towards the maximum allowed number of password attempts.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-bin - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-initramfs - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-run - 2017.75-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2017.75-3build1').
